subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Derek Anderson could have been the quarterback traded to Seattle. It could have been him, not Charlie Frye, standing on the Seahawks’ sideline. It could have been him, not Frye, running the scout team in practice.
snippet: Derek Anderson could have been the quarterback traded to Seattle. It could have been him, not Charlie Frye, standing on the Seahawks’ sideline. It could have been him, not Frye, running the scout team in practice.
